known_issues: Navbar logo is displaying a broken image icon; user requests replacing the logo image with text instead.

existing_features.title: In `frontend/src/components/home/HomeNavbar.tsx`, replace the navbar logo `` element (XPath: `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/nav[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]/div[1]/img[1]`) with a text node that reads exactly: `Ayanda Mdluli Atttorneys` (remove the image entirely so no broken image icon can appear).

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the navbar logo image with text "Ayanda Mdluli Atttorneys" (remove broken image).
